import React from 'react'; import { useScrollAnimation } from '../hooks/useScrollAnimation'; import './Papers.css'; const Papers = () => { const [ref, isVisible] = useScrollAnimation(); return (

Abstract Submission

Submit your research abstract for consideration. Abstracts should be 250-300 words.

  • Original research work
  • Clear methodology
  • Significant findings
Submit Abstract

Full Length Papers

Complete research papers with detailed analysis and comprehensive results.

  • 6-8 pages maximum
  • IEEE format required
  • Peer review process
Submit Paper

Submission Guidelines

Important Dates

Abstract Deadline: November 15, 2024

Full Paper Deadline: November 30, 2024

Notification: December 15, 2024

Topics of Interest

  • Artificial Intelligence
  • Machine Learning
  • Data Science
  • Cybersecurity
  • IoT & Embedded Systems
); }; export default Papers;
